groups.name: Categories
groups.description: Requirements related to the categorization of Wikipedia articles.

requirements.description: Every Wikipedia article should be added to at least one category.
requirements.reference: Every Wikipedia article should be added to at least one [[WP:CATEGORY|category]].

requirements.description: Gene and protein articles should be categorized under appropriate categories or subcategories.
requirements.reference: Categories or subcategories that may be appropriate for gene and protein articles include: [[:Category:Proteins]], [[:Category:Enzymes by function]], [[:Category:Genes by human chromosome]].
requirements.when: Applicable for gene and protein articles.
